Articles.Content:
Give me the ugliest, most horrible rocket/aircraft you can give me.

It still has to fly though.

I\'ll rate it on these three things.

1: What...

Basically, how in the hell does it fly. It looks so ugly, so what, that it deserves it\'s own rating on it.

2: Ugly

This is obvious, how ugly can you get it, so that you puke when you see it.

3:Performance

Can you still make it fly? Work?

Go crazy guys.

Well, I got this baby.

It\'s later forms, of which I have no screenshots, can escape the influence of kerbin, but they all really look the same.

Pshaw, amateurs.

Now this here, I think, should constitute a \'kerbal\' rocket.

It\'s able to get into an out-of-atmosphere suborbital trajectory. Just about. I reckon with a skilled pilot it could achieve low orbit.

Pshaw, amateurs.

Now this here, I think, should constitute a \'kerbal\' rocket.

It\'s able to get into an out-of-atmosphere suborbital trajectory. Just about. I reckon with a skilled pilot it could achieve low orbit.

You... what have you done?

Period.

Yes, it flies.

Yes, it\'s purpose is to split in two to release a satellite.

Yes, the boosters explode horribly when ejected.
Just kidding the bug-eyed fellah\'s kind of cute
Here is my in-progress orbital missile launcher. Can reach orbit. The missile does not fly straight.
its beautiful like a spider web with morning due

An old one, made in 0.15.

Horizontal takeoff, vertical landing, capable of suborbital flight... sometimes.

This thing was almost worthy of a challenge thread all by itself. Anybody who can land it after the SRBs have been fired is a fine pilot indeed.
